ValidationRule.description: At any stage a lead cannot have more than 1 primary interested product.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( Lead__r.RTL_Count_InterestedProducts_Primary__c == 1, ISCHANGED( Is_Primary__c ), Is_Primary__c == true), AND( Lead__r.RTL_Count_InterestedProducts_Primary__c == 1, ISNEW() , Is_Primary__c == true))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There cannot be more than one primary product of interest. Uncheck the other record before updating this product as primary.
